pages.text: The $(item)Mob Controller$(0) tells the factory which mob you would like to spawn. However not all factories are created equal. Each $(item)Mob Controller$(0) requires a minimum tier of factory to use. The tier can be seen by right clicking on a $(item)Mob Controller$(0)
The $(item)Mob Controller$(0) is created on the $(item)Stygian Anvil$(0) by combining a fully programmed $(item)Mob Shard$(0) with a $(item)Prism$(0) and $(item)Stygian Iron Plate$(0).
